      • BUCK_TRACE_DIR

        public static final Path BUCK_TRACE_DIR

      • oneTimeTestSubdirectory

        @Nullable
public static String oneTimeTestSubdirectory
        An optional path-component for the directory where test-results are written.

        See the --one-time-directory command line option in TestCommandOptions and TestCommand where this is used to give each parallel buck processes a unique test-results-directory thereby stopping the parallel processes from interfering with each others results.

        TODO(#4473736) Create a long-term non-hacky solution to this problem!
